text: José Eduardo Verástegui Córdoba (; born May 21, 1974) is a Mexican actor, singer and conservative activist. He was part of the band Kairo. He had movie roles in Chasing Papi, Bella, and Little Boy. His political ideas have been seen as ultra-conservative and far-right. In September 2023, he became an independent candidate for President of Mexico in the 2024 presidential election. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican singers Category:Mexican activists Category:Political activists Category:Actors from Tamaulipas Category:Politicians from Tamaulipas
title: Eduardo Verástegui
